actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapters 34 and 35 of title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans and widows and surviving children of veterans to a maximum of 45 months of educational assistance.

summary.text: Establishes a forty-five month period maximum for educational assistance in programs administered by the Veterans' Administration for veterans who have served on active duty for eighteen months or more since January 31, 1955.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapters 34 and 35 of title 38 of the United States Code in order to entitle veterans and widows and surviving children of veterans to a maximum of 45 months of educational assistance.
